author: legotrainfan
title: Useful and nothing more
review: You need a level crossing when you want your cars and trucks to cross tracks. This level crossing is good, but nothing special. It does not have many pieces. There are two flowers, two road signs and a minifig, but the whole thing could have been made nicer. A tree and a car would have been good in this set. And the gates cannot be lowered by remote control. There isn't a remote controlled level crossing for 9V trains, which is a pity. But still: what's a track layout without a level crossing? Maybe you can get it cheap on eBay in used condition.
